title: Poongatru Un Per Solla Lyrics Vetri Vizha
stanzas: <div>Poongatru Un Per Solla Lyrics Vetri Vizha

Poongaatru un per solla
kaetteney indru.
neerootru en thol konja
paartheney indru.

moongil kaattrom
maynaakkal rendu
moga panpaaduthe.
melai kaattrodu
kaiserthu naanal
kaadhal kondaaduthe.

yedhedho enna thondra
yegaantham ingae.
naan kaanum vannam
yaavum neethaane anbae.

jenma jenmangal aanaalum
enna jeevan unnoduthaan.
devai sridevi poovaaram sooda
dhevan ennoduthaan.

neela vaan kooda
niram maari pogum.
nesam niramaarumaa
kaala kaalangal
ponaalum enna
kadhal thadam maarumaa.

oiyaamal unnai konjum
oodhaapu vannam.
rajavin muththam kollum
roja poo kannam.

Poongaatru un per solla
kaetteney indru.
neerootru en thol konja
paartheney indru.
